dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 10 days (254 hours) continuous monitoring of a nest of the Kagu, a flightless bird of New Caledonia. The labels include four unique bird activities: feeding the chick, incubation/brooding, nest building while sitting on the nest, and nest building around the nest. Start and end times for each instance of these activities are provided with the annotations.
dcterms:title: Kagu bird wildlife monitoring dataset
